## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ABI8, ELD1, KOB1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ABA INSENSITIVE 8, ELONGATION DEFECTIVE 1, KOBITO
- **Description:**   elongation defective 1 protein / ELD1 protein;(source:Araport11)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS6557]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Growth-defective mutant; impaired cell growth results in pleiotropic effects in almost every aspect of cell development but particularly in cell elongation; defective vascular tissue differentiation (twisted vascular tissue); ectopic deposition of suberin around twisted vascular bundles; de-etiolated phenotype (retardation in hypocotyl elongation enables growth and development in darkness and consequent continuation of shoot development and flowering); sterile plants; dwarf phenotype (cannot be rescued by treatment with exogenous growth regulators); unable to grow in soil.
   - [kob1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Dwarf, cellulose deficient
## Function-related keywords:
   - [root differentiation zone](/tags/root-differentiation-zone/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[root elongation zone](/tags/root-elongation-zone/)
